text: Ficus pallida is a species of plant in the family Moraceae. It is found in Brazil, Colombia, and eastern Bolivia. In Bolivia, it is one of a few closely related trees in the genus Ficus popularly known as bibosi. ==References== * pallida Category:Least concern plants Category:Trees of Brazil Category:Trees of Colombia Category:Trees of Peru Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ficus pallida
